body_html: Just wanted to point out further, its CuDNN v5.1 for CUDA toolkit 7.5 (cudnn-7.5-linux-x64-v5.1.tgz) that solves the problem. cudnn-8.0-linux-x64-v5.1 should be used if you have CUDA toolkit 8.0
body_text: Just wanted to point out further, its CuDNN v5.1 for CUDA toolkit 7.5 (cudnn-7.5-linux-x64-v5.1.tgz) that solves the problem. cudnn-8.0-linux-x64-v5.1 should be used if you have CUDA toolkit 8.0
body: Just wanted to point out further, its **CuDNN v5.1 for CUDA toolkit 7.5 (cudnn-7.5-linux-x64-v5.1.tgz)** that solves the problem. cudnn-8.0-linux-x64-v5.1 should be used if you have CUDA toolkit 8.0
